question:
Which of the following were included in the list of fourteen points of Jinnah?
  1. Uniform measure of autonomy to be guaranteed to all provinces
  2. One third Muslim representation in central legislature
  3. One-third Muslim ministers in all central as well as provincial cabinet
  4. Separate set of Fundamental Rights for Muslims
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Muhammad Ali Jinnah drafted proposed the Fourteen Points as a constitutional reform plan to safeguard the political rights of the Muslims. Separate set of fundamental rights were not demanded by Jinnah.
